text.text_translated:
Many managers give comments.  
They put a negative comment between two positive comments.  
When they do this often, it becomes regular.  
Employees then think the positive comments only hide the negative.  
The good comments are not useful anymore.  
Good comments should make good performance stronger.  
They should help employees want to do good work.

Suggestion: Revise the text to capture the original's key terms more accurately using A2 vocabulary. Do not replace specific concepts with generic descriptions. best_attempt.text_translated:
Many managers try to add positive comments.  
They put a negative comment between two positive comments.  
But employees may think the positive comments hide the negative.  
Positive comments should not just soften the negative.  
They give positive comments to help good performance.
